column1: barbara ann leake| mrs. barbara ann leake
column4: passed away at her residence. she was born on october 19
column5: 1934 in lebanon. mrs. leake was a homemaker and member of st. augustine catholic church. she was preceded in death by her parents
column6: alonzo and zora newcomb craig. survivors include her husband
column36: ky. also surviving are twenty-seven grandchildren and six great-grandchildren. a mass of christian burial will be held at 11:00 a. m. friday
column38: 2015 at st. augustine catholic church. visitation will be held from 4:00 to 9:00 p. m. thursday at bosley funeral home with prayer services at 7:00 p. m. held by deacon joseph r. dant. expressions of sympathy may take the form of contributions to hosparus of central kentucky.
